name: Real Strike Tiger Fighting HD
description:
Real Strike Tiger Fighting 2017 is action, adventure game, where you pick a combat fighter and figh for your life in a cruel world. Explore different locations and use different fighting styles including japanese Taekwondo, Muay Thai, chinese Kung Fu, boxing, wrestling, kickboxing, karate and mma. Use all your skills like punching, kicking, blocking and super kicks and takedowns to get your opponents down on the ground.

Make deadly combos to pack the ultimate punch with clan of fighters! The complete gaming pleasure with state of the art visuals & 3D HD graphics and never seen before effects and immersive environments!

You can pick from 10 fighters and 3 arenas. Environment concists mainly military, war and army places. You must fight like a iron gladiator made of steel. Your fists must be leathal and fatal. We will add pvp multiplayer soon. Become a battle hero ninja, who knows how to KO mortal enemies without weapons, swords and guns.

You are the ultimate clash champion bro master who will win the street shadow club cup. Check story mode – survive at the series of dangerous fights against dangerous team opponents.
